input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Authentic Brand NEW PNC VF-4 Universal LCD View Finder Extend Bracket ONLY

Item specifications:
The Extension Bracket is to extend the range of the PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder to fit taller cameras or DSLR camera bodies with an added battery grip. The bracket adds an additional 1.3" (33mm) of height adjustment.
The Extension Bracket is to be used with PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder.
Package Included: Extension Bracket Only ( VF-4 Viewfinder is NOT included)
7-Day Money Back Guarantee, 1 Year USA Limited Warranty.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: The PNC VF-4 Universal LCD View Finder Extend Bracket is a must-have accessory for those who want to take their photography to the next level. This bracket extends the range of the PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder, making it suitable for taller cameras or DSLR camera bodies with an added battery grip. It adds an additional 1.3 inches of height adjustment to the viewfinder, ensuring that you get the perfect shot every time. Made from high-quality aluminum alloy, this bracket is durable and long-lasting, ensuring that you can use it for years to come. Plus, it comes with a 7-day money back guarantee and a 1-year USA limited warranty, giving you peace of mind that this investment is protected. With the PNC VF-4 Universal LCD View Finder Extend Bracket, you can take your photography to new heights and achieve amazing results.
input_text.Response B:
A brand new and authentic PNC VF-4 Universal LCD View Finder Extend Bracket. The Extension Bracket is to extend the range of the PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder to fit taller cameras or DSLR camera bodies with an added battery grip. The bracket adds an additional 1.3" (33mm) of height adjustment.

The Extension Bracket is to be used with PNC VF-4 LCD View Finder. VF-4 Viewfinder is NOT included.

Package Included: Extension Bracket Only ( VF-4 Viewfinder is NOT included)

7-Day Money Back Guarantee, 1 Year USA Limited Warranty.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B has a much better format and is easier to read
